reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Cool Breeze of Perfection!
reviews.reviewText: The Honeywell Turboforce Fan, model HT-900, is nothing short of a cooling marvel. As someone who values comfort and functionality, I couldn't be more thrilled with this little powerhouse, and I'm delighted to share my thoughts in this review.Cooling Powerhouse (5/5): Despite its compact size, the HT-900 delivers an impressive blast of cool air. Whether I'm sweltering on a hot summer day or simply need some air circulation in a stuffy room, this fan does the job beautifully. It effectively cools down my space in no time.Customizable Airflow (5/5): I appreciate the three-speed settings that allow me to customize the airflow to my liking. Whether I prefer a gentle breeze or a more robust fan speed, this unit has me covered. It's versatile and adapts effortlessly to my cooling needs.Compact and Portable (5/5): The size and design of this fan make it incredibly portable. I can easily move it from room to room, or even take it on the go when needed. Its compact footprint means it doesn't take up much space, making it an ideal choice for smaller rooms or desks.Whisper-Quiet Operation (5/5): One of the standout features of the HT-900 is its whisper-quiet operation. I can enjoy a comfortable breeze without any distracting noise, making it perfect for use in bedrooms or quiet workspaces. It never disrupts my peace and tranquility.Sturdy Build Quality (5/5): The build quality of this Honeywell fan is outstanding. It feels robust and well-made, reassuring me that it's built to last. The fan grill is durable and easy to clean, and the overall design is aesthetically pleasing.Energy-Efficient (5/5): I appreciate the energy efficiency of this fan. It helps me stay cool without significantly impacting my electricity bill. It's an eco-friendly and cost-effective solution for beating the heat.In conclusion, the Honeywell Turboforce Fan, HT-900, is a must-have for anyone seeking effective and efficient cooling. Its cooling power, customizable airflow, and quiet operation make it a standout choice. Its compact and portable design, along with its energy efficiency, only add to its appeal. I wholeheartedly recommend the HT-900 to anyone in need of a reliable and powerful fan. It's a true five-star product that has greatly improved my comfort during hot days and nights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stay Cool and Comfortable with the Honeywell Turboforce Fan!
reviews.reviewText: The Honeywell Turboforce Fan (HT-900) is an absolute gem that has been a lifesaver during hot summer days. This 11-inch fan has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance, convenience, and overall value.First and foremost, the cooling power of this fan is impressive. Despite its compact size, the Turboforce technology delivers a strong and consistent breeze that quickly circulates air throughout the room. Whether I'm working at my desk or lounging in the living room, this fan effectively creates a more comfortable environment.The design is sleek and unobtrusive. It's not an eyesore like some larger fans can be. The compact footprint allows me to place it on my desk, nightstand, or even the windowsill without taking up too much space.The fan's three-speed settings provide excellent customization. I can choose between a gentle breeze for a subtle cooling effect or crank it up to high for maximum airflow. The adjustable head tilts vertically, allowing me to direct the airflow exactly where I need it.One of the standout features is how quiet this fan operates. Even on the highest setting, it produces minimal noise, which is a welcome change from other fans that can be disruptive during work or sleep. This quiet operation ensures that I can enjoy the cooling benefits without any added annoyance.The build quality is impressive. The fan feels sturdy and well-made, and I can tell that it's built to last. The durability of the materials used is evident, which gives me confidence that this fan will serve me well for years to come.Cleaning the fan is a breeze (pun intended). The grille is easy to remove, allowing me to clean the blades and the surrounding area effortlessly. This maintenance-friendly feature is a big plus for keeping the fan operating at its best.In conclusion, the Honeywell Turboforce Fan (HT-900) is a fantastic investment for staying cool and comfortable in hot weather. Its powerful yet quiet performance, customizable settings, and convenient design make it an essential addition to any space. Whether you need a reliable fan for your workspace or a dependable companion for hot summer nights, this fan delivers top-notch performance that's sure to leave you satisfied. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small footprint, lots of output!
reviews.reviewText: My wife always gets too warm when putting makeup on in the bathroom, but we didn't want the expense and complexity of an overhead ceiling fan in there. Besides, that moves air around the whole room and she just wanted a little breeze in her face. Enter this fan - it's the perfect size for the countertop, looks nice, and the long electrical plug can reach a surprisingly long distance to an outlet. Clicking it on, there wasn't a lot of noise, but it put out a lot of wind! Excellent. And then we discovered that was the LOW setting! Medium and high weren't noisy either, but generated considerably more air movement. This was exactly what we were looking for! Money well spent if you ask me. Hopefully it lasts a long time, but if it's made by Honeywell, I'm sure it will be fine for years to come.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Smaller Fan
reviews.reviewText: We use this fan in our travel trailer. It’s light weight and can be wall mounted. The noise level is low and it moves plenty of air. The speed settings are helpful for setting the amount of air we need for cooling or just circulating the room air. Good price, simple design, and very functional. Perfect for a smaller room, travel trailer, or office space. Would purchase again.

Adquirí este ventilador en medio de la ola de calor y resultó una gran elección, tiene suficiente potencia para sentir la corriente a unos 4 o 5 metros, el ruido lo considero de normal a bajo, la construcción es bonita y sólida. Es pequeño pero muy cumplidor.

This is a very compact, sturdy fan and great for small areas or apartments. There are 3 speed settings and they all work well. I usually keep mine on the lowest setting as I find the other ones a bit too powerful for my usage. The pivot up and down works well; I find it stiff enough to stay where I point it. So far it has not fallen when pointed in either direction. The bottom is flat and wide enough that it makes it sturdy. It is still very lightweight though and very easy to move around and pick up.I do find this quite loud, especially on the higher settings, but it's not intolerable. I personally use this in my living room so I haven't tried to sleep with it, but I imagine it might keep some people awake.Overall, really great compact fan and does the job. Despite being made of plastic, it's sturdy and well made. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Good for the price - only criticism is the on/intensity/off switch is fiddly
Not so powerful as given in reviews. Just enough for a close use.
